title: Dream Theater - The Complete Discography [320kbps]
description:
Presenting The Complete Discography of Dream Theater.

I have made my own version of the Dream Theater discography, I know there is other versions but I have sorted these files out in my own style like my other previous torrents that I've made. I think Dream Theater are an excellent band and they have some very talented musicians like John Petrucci and Jordan Rudess.

This is all the official studio albums, all the official live albums. Three of the main EPs and the Greatest Hits compilation. If I haven't included anything it's because I don't think it's important like bootlegs etc.. that are not official releases. There is plenty here to listen to and I have made sure that the tagging is good and that they're presented nicely for you.

The music files are all MP3s and they're at the same bitrate which is 320kbps/44.1Khz CBR. The best quality you can have for MP3. The reason I didn't do these in flac is because flac is very large and not everybody is suited to passing such large torrents around. This one is fine and is only just over 4.5 gigabytes in size. The quality of the MP3s are superb and they're all encoded from lossless audio quality.

For those that don't know, Dream Theater, or DT for short, are a Progressive Metal band and they've been around for quite some time now.

Please help to seed this torrent if you download it and help to pass it around to other torrent downloaders.

The total time to play all the tracks is 1 day, 9 hours, 35 minutes and 25 seconds. I have included all the covers for you and also tagged each one into the album artwork tag.

I hope you enjoy this release, I know there's other Dream Theater discographies but I take great care in making mine and I enjoy putting them together. I don't like some discographies that people make where they include too much crap like all the singles and bootlegs and other stuff that isn't important.

Releases included as follows:
